front.title: Examples of the 'XML2RFC' Version 2 and 3 Vocabularies

abstract.t: This document gives examples of use of the "XML2RFC" vocabulary. The examples cover both version 2 and version 3. The purposes of this draft it to give authors of Internet Drafts examples of how to use the XML vocabularies, and to show how use of the version 2 vocabulary will change with version 3.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document gives examples of use of the "XML2RFC" vocabulary. The examples cover both version 2 and version 3 . Some of the examples are given to help authors use parts of the vocabulary common to both versions (called "v2" and "v3" in this document), while others appear in order to help authors transitioning from version 2 to version 3 to see how features from the earlier version relate to features in the later version.
This document currently only has one main example, which shows the commonly-used XML elements. A future version of the document may have a complete example.
